meanings.definition: An object that one need not, cannot, or does not wish to give a specific name to.
meanings.sent1: She found a shiny thing on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The box contained many different things.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the thing for hours.
meanings.sent4: His smile was the brightest thing in the room.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious thing in the attic turned out to be an old treasure chest.

meanings.definition: An action, activity, event, or idea.
meanings.sent1: Running is a good thing for your health.
meanings.sent2: Learning new things can be exciting.
meanings.sent3: The way he danced was a funny thing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a beautiful thing to hear.
meanings.sent5: The idea of traveling the world is an amazing thing to dream about.

meanings.sent1: Don't forget the most important thing in your presentation.
meanings.sent2: The little things in life can bring the most joy.
meanings.sent3: The way he tied his shoes was a strange thing to notice.
meanings.sent4: The key thing to remember is to stay positive.
meanings.sent5: The tiniest thing can sometimes make the biggest impact.
